name: Bag Boyz
description:
SUMMARY:

Bag Boyz is a puzzle game that simulates grocery shopping and is played in real-time. The player controls the character to do his shopping and move around a shopping center filled with grocery items and obstacles. The player must collect all the grocery items on their list whilst circumventing obstacles all within a set time limit.

CREDITS:

  • James Spagnolo - Programming
  • Nathan Crothers - Game Design
  • Rebecca Russell - Game Design

TESTING & FEEDBACK:

If you're interested in providing feedback to help improve the game, please fill out this survey after play testing: https://forms.gle/RAtVKLphuZfu1ymo6
